title: Belt
description: white cotton; embroidered ends 16\" long with 4 1/2\" gold fringe; embroidered sectoins have 2 black strips separating birds and flowers embroidered on applique; red, blue, green, pink
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
